pkgmetadata.longdescription: This package provides a driver for VDPAU, named libvdpau_va_gl.so.1. It uses OpenGL under the hood to accelerate drawing and scaling and VA-API (if available) to accelerate video decoding. For now VA-API is available on some Intel chips, and on some AMD video adapters with help of xvba-va-driver.

use.flag: Use the headers from x11-libs/libvdpau instead of bundled
